original_title: Max and Ruby - Ruby Writes A Story
overview: Ruby needs absolute quiet while she tried to write a story. But Max wants to play Cowboy. Eventually, he helps Ruby come up with the perfect idea for her story. Includes 6 Episodes: -Ruby Writes a Story -Ruby's Science Project -Max's Work of Art -Max misses the Bus -Ruby's Tent -Max's Dominoes
tagline: Ruby needs absolute quiet while she tried to write a story. But Max wants to play Cowboy. Eventually, he helps Ruby come up with the perfect idea for her story.
title: Max and Ruby - Ruby Writes A Story
